item

linkId: g1.4

text: Does your child move around by walking, rather than crawling on her hands and knees

Answers

-Value[x]
*YES (Details: [not stated] code yes = 'yes', stated as 'YES')

item

linkId: g1.5

text: Does your child walk well and seldom fall?

Answers

-Value[x]
*YES (Details: [not stated] code yes = 'yes', stated as 'YES')

item

linkId: g1.6

text: Does your child climb on an object such as a chair to reach something he wants ( for example, to get a toy on the counter or to help you in the kitchen)?

Answers

-Value[x]
*YES (Details: [not stated] code yes = 'yes', stated as 'YES')

item

linkId: g2.4

text: Does your child help turn pages of a book? (You may lift a page for her to grasp.)

Answers

-Value[x]
*YES (Details: [not stated] code yes = 'yes', stated as 'YES')

item

linkId: g2.5

text: Does your child throw a small ball with a forward arm motion? (if he simply drops the ball, mark not yet for this item)

Answers

-Value[x]
*YES (Details: [not stated] code yes = 'yes', stated as 'YES')

item

linkId: g2.6

text: Does your child stack a small block or toy on top of another one? (You could also use spools of thread, small boxes, or toys that are about 1 inch in size.)

Answers

-Value[x]
*YES (Details: [not stated] code yes = 'yes', stated as 'YES')

item.text: Does your child move around by walking, rather than crawling on her hands and knees
Does your child walk well and seldom fall?
Does your child climb on an object such as a chair to reach something he wants ( for example, to get a toy on the counter or to help you in the kitchen)?
Does your child help turn pages of a book? (You may lift a page for her to grasp.)
Does your child throw a small ball with a forward arm motion? (if he simply drops the ball, mark not yet for this item)
Does your child stack a small block or toy on top of another one? (You could also use spools of thread, small boxes, or toys that are about 1 inch in size.)
